title: Andrew McCarthy: Meet the Author
itunes:author: iBooks
itunes:subtitle: In his book, The Longest Way Home, award-winning travel writer and actor Andrew McCarthy takes us on a deeply personal journey. The Longest Way Home reflects his irrepressible taste of adventure and a vivid sense of place, and plays out amid some of the world’s most evocative locales. Andrew engaged in a discussion of the book and took questions from the audience at the Apple Store, SoHo.

itunes:keywords: Andrew McCarthy, The Longest Way Home, Weekend at Bernie's, St. Elmo's Fire, Pretty In Pink, Less Than Zero
